review: There are good doctors and then there are brilliant yet caring Doctors. Dr Shreyaâ€™s Shah belongs to the later category. Our mother wears a denture. She was complaining of severe pain in her denture for several weeks. Dr Shah correctly diagnosed the issue as a viral infection and removed the infected tissue. the treatment is still ongoing. Most importantly, he took great care and provided compassionate care to our mother. I would highly recommend Dr Shah to anyone with dental issues.

Dentist is gentleman * ****** ******** He is more keen to solve patient problem & tries to keep patient bill low. We find very few healthcare professionals like him in our generation. Recommended for everyone who do not want surprises after Dentist's visit.

Good knowledgeable, soft spoken, skillful doctor.
Treatment rates are very reasonable.
God blessed the Doctor.
